statements: SELECT * FROM products_inventory;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products_inventory WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM products_inventory ORDER BY product_type ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products_inventory WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM products_inventory WHERE product_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM products_inventory WHERE in_stock = TRUE ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_type, price FROM products_inventory WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products_inventory WHERE product_type = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_type FROM products_inventory WHERE in_stock = TRUE AND price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT * FROM products_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%phone%' ORDER BY product_type ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT card_number, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY credit_limit DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date  > '2023-01-01';
SELECT card_number, card_type, expiration_date FROM credit_cards WHERE card_type = 'Visa';
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000 AND interest_rate < 10;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(loan_amount) AS avg_loan_amount FROM loans GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(loan_amount) > 7000;
SELECT loan_id, start_date, end_date FROM loans WHERE end_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM loans GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(loan_amount) > 20000;
SELECT * FROM loans;
SELECT loan_id, loan_type, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_type = 'Personal';
SELECT loan_id, loan_type, loan_amount FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
SELECT card_id, card_type, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE card_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_type='Home Loan' ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT loan_id, loan_type, customer_id FROM loans WHERE loan_status='Approved' AND loan_amount > 50000;
SELECT DISTINCT loan_type FROM loans WHERE customer_id=1001;
SELECT loan_id, loan_type, customer_id, loan_status FROM loans WHERE loan_status='Pending' OR loan_status='Rejected';
SELECT loan_id, loan_type, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_status='Approved' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loan_type FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT card_limit, card_type FROM credit_cards WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT investment_id, investment_type, investment_return FROM investment_options LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT investment_type, investment_return FROM investment_options WHERE customer_id = '1fd6a876-7ed5-4c5e-b3a7-5c603da2a413';
SELECT * FROM credit_cards ORDER BY card_limit DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, loan_amount FROM customers c JOIN loans l ON c.customer_id = l.customer_id WHERE loan_type = 'Personal';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number='123-456-7890';
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM loans WHERE interest_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE reward_points >= 1000 ORDER BY credit_limit ASC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE customer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM loans LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_invested, AVG(amount) AS avg_investment FROM investments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
